THIS IS WINDOWS 8!!! People that say "This Is Windows 7" are dumb, because in case you didn't know: EVERY WINDOWS RELEASE IS BASED ON THE PREVIOUS VERSION. Remember how Win 95, 98, 98 SE, ME, and 2000 looked alike? But they had different features. Remember how people said Windows Vista was the unfinished Windows 7? Well this is almost the same, Windows 8 will just enhance the look and add new features to Windows 7!
